alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Benton, northwestern Madison, western Carroll and northeastern Washington Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 630 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Springdale, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Eureka Springs... Hindsville... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Johnson... Goshen... Rockhouse... Mayfield... Best... Lookout... Sonora... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
